sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Risk management and resilience/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The Burundi country office implemented new procedures aligned with the Eastern and Southern Africa Regional Office's Evaluation Framework and the revised evaluation policy to improve the quality and use of two ongoing evaluations and the design and planning of three additional ones. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of evaluation that obtain at least satisfactory rating by GEROS
